items.sentence: Tom is approximately the same height as you.
Tom invited his friends over for a barbecue.
Tom has written a lot of interesting things.
Tom has lost his keys three times this week.
Tom had a pen, but he didn't have any paper.
Tom doesn't think Mary would really do that.
Tom doesn't think Mary would let John drive.
Tom doesn't plan on going anywhere tomorrow.
Tom doesn't care whether we help him or not.
Tom didn't want to spend any time with Mary.
Tom asked Mary to meet him under the bridge.
Tom and Mary are currently living in Boston.
Tom and I are the ones who should apologize.
There are three men waiting for you outside.
I appreciate the invitation, but I can't go.
Tom is going to love the hat you bought him.
Tom is going to have to make some new rules.
Tom is going to have to do better than this.
Tom is going to have an interesting evening.
Tom is going to do what Mary told him to do.
